nodes.text: Vineyard was a settlement that was located on the planet Nyriaan.

Vineyard was established by House Melantha in 16 BBY, to serve the Imperial aristocracy on Nyriaan, and thus strengthen the ties between the House and the Galactic Empire. Filled with luxury buildings, it gave Imperials the opportunity to experience the decadence of the Tapani sector nobility.

During the Galactic Civil War, the settlement became a target for Rebel Alliance espionage operations on Nyriaan. A number of Alliance agents gained employment at Vineyard as servants and menial laborers, to try and learn secrets from House Melantha's clients.
